Retro-Futuristic Hotel: Theme: Retro-futurism, blending the aesthetics of the 1950s and 60s with futuristic elements.
Treehouse Village: Theme: A whimsical, eco-friendly retreat nestled among the trees.
Underwater Oasis: Theme: A luxurious, submarine-inspired hotel that transports guests to an underwater world.
Time Traveler's Inn: Theme: A hotel that transports guests through different eras of history.
Space Station Hotel: Theme: A futuristic hotel that simulates the experience of living on a space station.
